forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 44. Southeast wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 9pm, then rain and snow showers between 9pm and 5am. Cloudy. Low around 36, with temperatures rising to around 38 overnight. South wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 40 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 17 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: 6-inches of snow on Thursday and a complete powertilling of the upper loops to World Cup specs this morning. A touch soft today, but should be an amazing 7-10 day stretch starting tomorrow. Huge shoutout to Ben and the entire crew at Nubs for their commitment to Nordic skiing.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 7 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails were packed yesterday morning. Conditions are very good on the upper trails. The lower trails are marginal.
nubsNob.comments: It feels like the middle of winter today and the snow is in good shape. The cold, frequent grooming and some fresh snow over the last few days have further improved conditions. Expect hard, but not icy snow this morning. The snow should loosen up by the afternoon as the temperature goes above freezing. NASTAR Racing on Birch Run from 12:30 to 2:30 PM. Seasonal Road will play the Nub's Pub this afternoon. Pintail Peak lodge is open with a deli and espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
